title: API Gateway Comparison: Apache APISIX vs. Kong vs. Traefik vs. KrakenD vs. Tyk - API7.ai
description: A detailed architectural and functional comparison of five leading open-source API gateways—Apache APISIX, Kong, Traefik, KrakenD, and Tyk—covering extensibility, configuration, observability, and best use cases.
sitename: API Gateway Comparison: Apache APISIX vs. Kong vs. Traefik vs. KrakenD vs. Tyk - API7.ai
cntitle: API 网关对比：Apache APISIX vs. Kong vs. Traefik vs. KrakenD vs. Tyk - API7.ai
cndescription: 对五种领先的开源 API 网关——Apache APISIX、Kong、Traefik、KrakenD 和 Tyk——的详细架构和功能比较，涵盖了可扩展性、配置、可观测性和最佳用例。
